tag_list: andy-barr, 10yetis, 10-yetis, pr-agency, online-pr, linkbuilding-pr, onlinevideocompany, asocialmediaagency, bloggabase
overview:
Andy works in public relations and has a small portfolio of wider business investments that include an online video production company, blogger engagement tool, and a finance related web-development and content company.

Having never worked for a PR Agency until forming 10 Yetis Public Relations, Andy and his business partner Jilly has now developed the business to the point where it has an international client base and is recognised by its peers as being a pioneer in its sector.

Andy is a regular speaker around the globe on topics such as digital media, PR & SEO working together and the way in which new breeds of PR Agencies operate.

The names of the other companies in which Andy is involved are: BloggaBase.com, Online-Video-Company.co.uk and PeToBa.com
